Medium: Cover with letterpress illustration by Mayakovsky on front; 11 lithographed illustrations with manuscript text by Filonov on 16 leaves of orange paper, and 1 letterpress reproduction of a drawing by Malevich
Artist: Pavel Filonov, Kazimir Malevich, Vladimir Mayakovsky
CreditLine: Gift of The Judith Rothschild Foundation
Title: Izbornik stikhov s poslesloviem rechiaria. 1907-1914 gg.
